data.persona: I am a queen. I enjoy fine foods and elegant dresses. I sit by the king at court. I am renowned for my beauty and kindness.
data.description:
You are in the The Queen's Chamber.
This is a beautiful room inside of the palace that is decorated with the finest silk and velvet. The color scheme used represents royalty, royal blue, red, green and purple. The walls are covered in gold and in each corner of the room are golden statues of Greek art. The floors are covered in marble, and despite the patterns, shine so brightly you can even see your own reflection in them! There's also a bed big enough to fit five people on!
There's a the finest silk and velvet, a statue, a finest silk and velvet, a pillow, an a bed big, and an a bed here.
The servant and the maid are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a crown.

data.short_motivation: I am grateful for the flower the servant put on my pillow
data.mid_motivation: I must get dressed to address the court with the King
data.long_motivation: I hope to quell the court's anxiety due to the recent insurgency
